response.original_title: 心霊vs人間 古今東西 関ヶ原の戦い編
response.overview: This is the sixth horror documentary featuring OPQ's "Dapom," who enjoys absolute popularity among young people on the Internet video distribution service, and psychic idols Ryua, Shizuku Hoshino, and ZeNrA, who take on the challenge of visiting terrifying haunted places. The four psychic mavericks use ancient and modern séance techniques to summon spirits.
response.title: Psychic vs. Human: Past and Present - Battle of Sekigahara Edition

titles.title: Psychic vs Human: Kokon Tōzai - Sekigahara-hen
